description: Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to edit content or functionality
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to abort an in-progress operation
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to close a view
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to confirm an action
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to delete content or remove functionality
Generic label for a text field to input a description
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to confirm an action
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to save an action or setting
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to submit and form or action
Generic loading message when a form is in process of being submitted
Message displayed in error notification when an operation fails unexpectedly
defaultMessage: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again and contact {supportEmail} if the condition persists.

description: Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to update an action
Message shown to the user when they are using an unsupported browser
